evidence.claim: Home Matters uses AWS cloud services for scalable infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards in its operations.
Integration with EHR systems supports FHIR and HL7 standards.
Home Matters leverages Azure for its data management needs.
Claims processing includes support for X12 transaction sets.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of use cases for X12 transactions or API automation.
